dmca.title: [ABUSE] TRIPLICATE Notice of Copyright referencehttp://www.bestbirthdaycard.com/
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: crs@spamcop.net [mailto:crs@spamcop.net] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2006 10:01 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] TRIPLICATE Notice of Copyright
referencehttp://www.bestbirthdaycard.com/

copyright@theplanet.com,admins@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com


TRIPLICATE Notice of Copyright reference http://www.bestbirthdaycard.com/

Mr C R Slater
C/O 49A City Road
Newcastle upon Tyne
NE12AQ
England
01912210338

Sir, Madam,

I am the genuine true author/owner and copyright holder of the below
verse/poem taken from my Greeting Card web site (a copyright warning wad
downloaded with this material and knowingly removed by the offender).

This is now currently illegally displayed on your server without any given
author/owner consent. My Greeting Cards have been online since 1986. I write
material to raise income for three registered UK charities these provide me
with copyright on all my verses/poems works.

I swear on oath (also as a committed Christian) under penalty of Federal and
European prosecution for perjury that I am author and copyright holder of
the said material (displayed as below).

If a signed copy of this notice is required by your company I will post one
today as an image attachment for you to view and print.

/Christopher R Slater/
Christopher R Slater

Poem displayed on your site clearly marked as on my own web site at
location(s) given below.

http://www.quickegreets.com/birthday/bday15.htm
http://www.quickegreets.com/javafree/bday15.htm
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/bday15.htm
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/javafree/bday15.htm


ChrisRS RC2000
ALL Rights Reserved

1.Birthday Sister
Now listen to me Sister You've passed every test, A number one Sister One
who surely the best? Thoughts this Birthday, Sent in the lines of rhyme,
Hold many wishes for you? Packed within each line. You're special and
thought of What more could I say, But to add that you have A truly Happy
Birthday.


http://www.bestbirthdaycard.com/

http://www.quickegreets.com/birthday/bday18.htm
http://www.quickegreets.com/javafree/birthday/bday18.htm
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/birthday/bday18.htm
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/javafree/birthday/bday18.htm

ChrisRS RC1995
ALL Rights Reserved


Dear Son Loving family wishes today dear Son Are relayed for you on this
Birthday, And an added token of special love, We also lovingly send over
your way. Youe treasured very much you see More than you may ever know,
Trough all the years, with care and love, Dear Son wee watched you grow.
Remember youe always thought of, And our family love and care is true, Have
the best ever yet Happy Birthday From your family at home, just to you.



http://www.quickegreets.com/birthday/bday44.htm
http://www.quickegreets.com/javafree/birthday/bday44.htm
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/birthday/bday44.htm
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/javafree/birthday/bday44.htm

ChrisRS RC1990
ALL Rights Reserved

3.Angel Birthday
Wife An Angel she came to me one day / Took my hand with love tenderly / I
gazed at this Angel, held her close / She gently sat herself upon my knee.
She had no wings, nor glowing halo / But glowed in brilliant shining light /
And truly sparkling eyes she did have / One which twinkled, radiantly
bright.
She placed her arm around my waist / And her face up close next to mine /
Then she squeezed me ever so gently / Kissed my lips, soft sweet and fine.
I felt my pulse rate race and flutter / It may seem as if my time had came /
Yet in awe I couldn speak or stutter / At this Angel, who has but one name?
You see, the moral of this story is / In awe stricken state, I do declare /
That this Angels name is surely Wife / Happy Birthday, loving Angel so fair.


/Christopher Robin Slater/
Christopher Robin Slater



Please Note

1.) The material has been taken displayed illegally used without given
consent (data theft)
2.) Copyright and anti theft legal warnings have been downloaded and removed
3.) The data thief has falsified the author information on your site
(plagiarism)
4.) My work has been left with out copyright warning and open to further
abuse on your server
5.) Your own company TOS (terms of service) have been breached 6.)As long as
this material is displayed on servers without given author consent your
company, any hosting servers are liable for
a.) payment of commission and royalties
b.) soliciting traffic from unauthorised illegal display and use to
potentially gain interest to your service

If you search through Yahoo MSN or Google engines you will see this has
clearly been taken from my own web via given URL's (below), Your users IP
address pages viewed were also logged as recorded by the site meter in use
and your customers own ISP servers too.


Quoting Policy Enforcement <abuse@theplanet.com>:

> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1

> http://www.theplanet.com/legal/
>
> Thank you,

>
